message.content:
cs.AR, cs.ET, cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.SY 

This paper discusses the resilience aspects of hardware accelerators for neural networks, which falls under the domain of computer architecture and embedded systems. Therefore, cs.AR (Computer Architecture) and cs.ET (Embedded Systems) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also discusses fault characterization and mitigation techniques, which can be categorized under cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) and cs.SE (Software Engineering). Finally, the paper deals with the implementation of hardware accelerators, which can be classified under cs.SY (Systems and Control).
